Ch.1 Structure and Function

describe both the macrostructure and microstructure of muscle and bone,â€¢ describe the sliding-filament theory of muscular contraction,â€¢ describe the specific morphological and physiological characteristics of different muscle fiber types and predict their relative involvement in different sport events, andâ€¢ describe the anatomical and physiological characteristics of the cardiovascular and respiratory systems. ls-type:: annotation hl-page:: 17 hl-color:: blue

item.description:
page + 40

Part 1 The profession of medicine

  • The practice of medicine

    • To wrest from nature the secrets which have perplexed philosophers in all ages, to track to their sources the causes of disease, to correlate the vast stores of knowledge, that they may be quickly available for the prevention and cure of diseaseâ€”these are our ambitions. â€”William Osler, 1849â€“1919

    • Jameson JL, Longo DL: Precision medicineâ€”personalized, problem- atic, and promising. N Engl J Med 372:2229, 2015.
